laisareis qam jah haitiþ þuk.
JOHN 11.29 iþ jaina, sunsei hausida, urrais sprauto jah iddja du imma.
JOHN 11.30 niþþan nauhþanuh qam Iesus in weihsa, ak was nauhþanuh in þamma stada þarei gamotida imma Marþa.

JOHN 11.31 Iudaieis þan þai wisandans miþ izai in garda þrafstjandans ija, gasaiƕandans Marjan þatei sprauto usstoþ jah usiddja, iddjedunuh afar izai qiþandans þatei gaggiþ du hlaiwa, ei greitai jainar.
JOHN 11.32 iþ Marja, sunsei qam þarei was Iesus, gasaiƕandei ina draus imma du fotum qiþandei du imma:
frauja, iþ weiseis her, ni þauh gaswulti meins broþar.
JOHN 11.33 þanuh Iesus, sunsei gasaƕ ija greitandein jah Iudaiuns þaiei qemun miþ izai gretandans, inrauhtida ahmin jah inwagida sik silban.
JOHN 11.34 jah qaþ:
ƕar lagideduþ ina?
qeþun du imma:
frauja, hiri jah saiƕ.
JOHN 11.35 jah tagrida Iesus.
JOHN 11.36 þaruh qeþun þai Iudaieis:
sai, ƕaiwa frioda ina.
JOHN 11.37 sumai þan ize qeþun:
niu mahta sa izei uslauk augona þamma blindin gataujan ei jah sa ni gadauþnodedi?
JOHN 11.38 þanuh Iesus aftra inrauhtiþs in sis silbin gaggiþ du þamma hlaiwa.
wasuh þan hulundi jah staina ufarlagida was ufaro.
JOHN 11.39 qaþ Iesus:
afnimiþ þana stain.
qaþ du imma swistar þis dauþins Marþa:
frauja, ju fuls ist;
fidurdogs auk ist.
JOHN 11.40 qaþ izai Iesus:
niu qaþ þus þatei jabai galaubeis, gasaiƕis wulþu gudis?
JOHN 11.41 ushofun þan þana stain þarei was.
iþ Iesus uz-hof uh augona iup jah qaþ:
atta, awiliudo þus, unte andhausides mis;
JOHN 11.42 jah þan ik wissa þatei sinteino mis andhauseis;
akei in manageins þizos bistandandeins qaþ, ei galaubjaina þatei þu mik insandides.
JOHN 11.43 jah þata qiþands stibnai mikilai hropida:
Lazaru, hiri ut!
JOHN 11.44 jah urrann sa dauþa gabundans handuns jah fotuns faskjam, jah wlits is auralja bibundans.
qaþ du im Iesus:
andbindiþ ina jah letiþ gaggan.
JOHN 11.45 þanuh managai þize Judaiei þai qimandans at Marjin jah saiƕandans þatei gatawida, galaubidedun imma.
JOHN 11.46 sumai-þ-þan ize galiþun du Fareisaium jah qeþun du im þatei gatawida Iesus.
JOHN 11.47 galesun þan þai auhumistans gudjans jah þai Fareisaieis...
...JOHN 12.1 in Beþanijin, þarei was Lazarus sa dauþa, þanei urraisida us dauþaim Iesus.
JOHN 12.2 þaruh gawaurhtedun imma nahtamat jainar, jah Marþa andbahtida;
iþ Lazarus was sums þize anakumbjandane miþ imma.
JOHN 12.3 iþ Marja nam pund balsanis nardaus pistikeinis filugalaubis jah gasalboda fotuns Iesua jah biswarb fotuns is skufta seinamma;
iþ sa gards fulls warþ daunais þizos salbonais.
JOHN 12.4 qaþ þan ains þize siponje is, Judas Seimonis sa Iskariotes, izei skaftida sik du galewjan ina:
JOHN 12.5 duƕe þata balsan ni frabauht was in ·t· skatte jah fradailiþ wesi þarbam?
JOHN 12.6 þat-uþ-þan qaþ, ni þeei ina þize þarbane kara wesi, ak unte þiubs was jah arka habaida jah þata innwaurpano bar.
JOHN 12.7 qaþ þan Iesus:
let ija;
in dag gafilhis meinis fastaida þata.
JOHN 12.8 iþ þans unledans sinteino habaiþ miþ izwis, iþ mik ni sinteino habaiþ.
JOHN 12.9 fanþ þan manageins filu Iudaie þatei Iesus jainar ist, jah qemun, ni in Iesuis ainis, ak ei jah Lazaru seƕeina, þanei urraisida us dauþaim.
JOHN 12.10 munaidedun-uþ-þan auk þai auhumistans gudjans, ei jah Lazarau usqemeina, JOHN 12.11 unte managai in þis garunnun Iudaiei jah galaubidedun Iesua.
JOHN 12.12 iftumin daga manageins filu sei qam at dulþai, gahausjandans þatei qimiþ Iesus in Iairausaulwmai, JOHN 12.13 nemun astans peikabagme jah urrunnun wiþragamotjan imma jah hropidedun:
osanna, þiuþida sa qimanda in namin fraujins, þiudans Israelis.
